If you ask yourself what 2.0 can bring to your company, and especially to knowledge management, I recommend you this very good presentation. It's available on slideshare, done by people from T-System. I found it very interesting and very helpful. Enjoy !

** The Wikipedia Myth - Enterprise 2.0 Knowledge Management ** from T-Systems Multimedia Solutions

** Enterprise 2.0 Knowledge Management - People at the Center ** from T-Systems Multimedia Solutions

** Enterprise 2.0 Knowledge Management - Getting started ** from T-Systems Multimedia Solutions
